info.name: RimWorld Wiki Dark Theme
info.additionalInfo:
Update 8 17.08.20
-changed to dark 'List of abbreviations' on recent changes
-changed to dark tags on recent changes
-changed to dark hovers and actives tabs at filter list on recent chenges
-changed to dark background at 'wiki/Template'
-changed font color to black on pre at users profiles
-changed to dark background at .fmbox-system on wiki/Template

Update 7 03.08.20
-feed is now dark
-added button hover, focus and active gradient
-inverted black 'clear icon' on search
-changed to darker yellow on '.diffchange' and '.diff-deletedline'
-changed font color on 'results info'

Update 6 21.07.20
-fixes on "browse properties" tab

Update 5 16.07.20
-fixes on notifications

Update 4 15.07.20
-changed background to black on community portal tab
-added a little border-radius on 'pre' and '.mw-code'

Update 3 14.07.20
-profile tabs on search are now black
-big changes and fixes on edit structure tab
-new scrollbar

Update 2 30.06.20
-fixes on watchlist, preferecnes, talk tabs
-changes and fixes on register tab
-font color fixes
-minor changes

Update 1 26.06.20
-improved/changed/fixed a lot of things, its 6AM and i'am going to sleep
